resources.string: No e-mail address selected. Press the Select button to select one from the contacts.
Press the Select button to select a different e-mail address from the contacts.
Don\'t forget to place a shortcut to QuickMail on your home screen!
\ QuickMail is an app that will let you quickly send e-mail to a pre-defined address. This is useful to quickly send reminders to yourself, or to an online ToDo-list application (such as NirvanaHQ).
Move the icon to your home screen for easy access, or share pages via \"@ QuickMail\".
Note that QuickMail only supports one e-mail address.
\ This program is free software, released under the GNU General Public License. For more information, visit the website.
